dimensions.label: Perceived Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically analyze data and consider multiple perspectives.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to make decisions.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin view global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will consider the impact of global events on their own life.
Your FarTwin will prioritize national interests over international concerns.

dimensions.label: Financial Values
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach money and material possessions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and responsible spending.
Your FarTwin will value comfort, luxury, and indulgence.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning and self-improvement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take initiative and pursue their own interests.
Your FarTwin will require a clear plan and structured approach to learn effectively.

dimensions.label: Social Needs
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize alone time and may feel drained by social interactions.
Your FarTwin will thrive in social situations and enjoy being around others.

dimensions.label: Cognitive Bias
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach decision-making?

options.description: Your FarTwin will consider multiple perspectives and evaluate evidence objectively.
Your FarTwin may be more likely to accept information that confirms their existing beliefs.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will create work that is genuine and true to their own style.
Your FarTwin may rely on imagination or external inspiration to create innovative work.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will establish clear routines and stick to a schedule.
Your FarTwin may prefer a more relaxed approach to time management, adapting to changing circumstances.
